plugin.name: messaging
plugin.description: SeisComP messaging component that enables communication of modules over the network.

parameter.name: enable
parameter.description: Enables/disables local messaging (spread+scmaster). The messaging component is an integral component of all modules (except eg acquisition modules). If you are not sure what to do, enable it.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: Defines the messaging port. The default port is 4803 and the messaging connection for all modules running locally is localhost:4803.
